caption: 2. Open the Academics tab in Workday
3.Choose the Registration & Courses tab in Workday
4.Click Refresh and then 'Download to Excel' from Current Classes field
Click on Choose File button to select the downloaded file
7. Select the excel file and click on Upload button to upload the selected file
Click on Convert button to start the conversion process
9.The ICS file will be generated and downloaded automatically
10. Double-click the ICS file to open it in your calendar application
